entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to periods of rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
